name: Kannur International Airport
description: Welcome to the official App of Kannur International Airport, Kannur.   This Mobile application will help you to see the flight status, flight timetable, operational airlines, shop and eat options.   Here is how you can use the app:  - You can see the Flight status with real-time updates. - Get information on where to shop and eat in the Airport. - Google maps to help you navigate to the Kannur International Airport. - Find information about In & Around Kannur.  - See detailed information on airport facilities, gallery, Tenders & Orders, flight information and more.
